scripts.say: As expected of the esteemed original First Carrier Division... I've been bested.
Allow me once more to welcome you to the Diadem of Light. We are honored to have guests visiting us from afar.
Apologies, we couldn't afford to go easy on you.
Having said that, you've matured magnificently, Ryuuhou. You would be a perfect fit for the Sakura Empire's Carrier Task Force.
I am grateful for your praise. However, as much as it shames me to admit, I still have many things to learn. I'm afraid I wouldn't be ready for such an important position...
That wasn't flattery, it was my honest evaluation of you.
If you'll pardon me emulating Kaga: we live in a kill-or-be-killed world, and only those like you with power can bring it justice.
Tomfoolery aside, you have done a fantastic job on your ritual preparations.
The Sakura Empire's future depends on our combined efforts. What do you say we work together?
It would be an honor. I shall work as hard as I can towards my goal of one day becoming a part of the Carrier Task Force!
On another note... I was surprised to see you attend this exercise at all, Akagi. There shouldn't be any need for the Sakura Empire's de facto leader to attend...
Oh, no. It's times like these when we need to cooperate.
Be it rituals, Siren technology, or even the Decisives, the Sakura Empire will use anything at its disposal.
(I'm sure even Amagi would've done this if she could.)
Hehe, it strangely feels like I'm looking at a younger version of myself.
Never mind that. Good luck in your further pursuits, Ryuuhou.
